segments.text: The fried shrimp is crunchy ! But my mom will never cook shrimp this way . She always says that fried food is not healthy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How does she cook the shrimp ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She often cooks it in a large pan of boiling water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like that . I like fried food , fried potatoes , fried chicken , fried sausage ... I can't see why fried food is not healthy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My mom says it has a lot of fat . I also suggest you do not eat so many fried things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's all right ! I often fry sausages when my mom is not at home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I really want to have a try !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come to my house this Sunday . My mom will not be at home then . We can cook some wonderful fried food by ourselves !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like a good idea ! But I'm afraid my mom will be angry about it .
segments.speaker: S1
